issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: [Android SDK Home] No Android SDKs were found under the specified SDK location After I have upgraded my SDKs
fields.summary: [Android SDK Home] No Android SDKs were found under the specified SDK location
fields.environment:
Axway Appcelerator Studio, build: 5.0.0.201712081732

Appcelerator CLI
  Installer                   = 4.2.13
  Core Package                = 7.0.4

Titanium CLI
  CLI Version                 = 5.1.1
  node-appc Version           = 0.2.44

TItanium SDK  =  7.2.0.GA
TItanium SDK = 6.1.2.GA

comments.body: What SDK update are you talking about? Is it the Titanium SDK? If so, The SDK update was unsuccessful somehow, You need to delete the SDK folder from the titanium SDK folder and reinstall by the terminal. Thanks.
Hello [~ppancholi], Can you get back to us with updated info? Thanks.
